ygData.subject: Re: making money (was: wis items)
ygData.msgSnippet: Might I suggest you try this in Cazic?  =) Just the other night I heard somebody shouting asking somebody to buy all their FS from them at 2pp each.  Since you
ygData.messageBody:
Might I suggest you try this in Cazic? =)
Just the other night I heard somebody shouting asking somebody to buy all their FS from them
at 2pp each. Since you can sell them at 5pp each, it's a good deal. There is a lot more FS in Cazic than there is in unrest and it's a lot further from good selling grounds. This is especially a good spot if you play an Ogre or a Troll and can sell in Ogguk... since most of the people in Cazic have to go much further to sell. I know that I usually end up leaving FS lyin on the ground in Cazic because it weighs me down to the point where i can't even move. It works out to be a good deal for the people in Cazic because they can sell all their FS with a 2pp/per profit and not have to run back to sell their stuff, and a good deal for you as well because you make 3pp per piece. I don't think this would work as well in Unrest since there isn't nearly as much FS available.

-Eachann Bronzeleaf,
-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 12:58 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] making money (was: wis items)


> From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
>
> I've been doing a similiar thing in Unrest lately. Suprisingly, it isn't as
> profitable as you might imagine. At some points, it gets down right
> annoying to do. I have made about 30pp doing it in one nite, but it does
> become tiresome. If you have the patience to do it, you can spend hours
> trying to buy and sell. But in my opinion, it just ends up being a waste of
> time.
>
> Brytewing.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Heather Daley [mailto:blushn@...]
> Sent: 1999/12/14 11:43 AM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] making money (was: wis items)
>
>
> From: "Heather Daley" <blushn@...>
>
> There was a great little business on Fennin Ro called, Rokk and Rhunes
> Emporium, hehe. These 2 Ogres had this business going in Cazic doing the
> very same thing. At least one of them was there everyday. They had to have
> made tremendous amounts of cash there. It is very time consuming and takes
> aways from the hunt quite a bit, but it is an easy way to make cash.
> I also just recently noticed that there is a travelling person in South
> Karana now, he starts out at the Bridge, announcing to the zone he is there
> to change their money for them from Copper to silver, gold, etc... He then
> travels to different set locations, Centaurs, aviaks, etc... advertising as
> he goes. I'm not sure how successful he is but seems like it would be
> profittable.
>
> Bree
>
>
